directions: In a medium serving bowl, mix together the black beans, tomatoes, chilies, bell pepper, vinegar, oil and salt. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
3 serrano chile peppers, seeded and chopped
1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
title: Cold Black Bean Salad
